notifications.increase_reward_stage_2_body: Earn {{.new_referrer_verify_reward}} LIT points for each friend who joins via your link for the next {{.period_hours}} hours only.
notifications.increase_reward_stage_1_body: Earn {{.new_referrer_verify_reward}} LIT points for each friend who joins via your link for the next {{.period_hours}} hours only.
notifications.first_daily_time_bonus_title: You just got your daily bonus for “Time on app” +{{.daily_time_bonus}} LIT points.
notifications.first_daily_time_bonus_body: If you do this daily bonus 7 days in a row you get a weekly super bonus {{.weekly_time_bonus}} LIT points.
notifications.first_guest_x_paid_views_title: Create your account and get your first {{.signup_bonus}}  LIT points
notifications.first_guest_x_paid_views_body: On Lit.it you earn rewards for watching & sharing videos or inviting people
notifications.first_weekly_time_bonus_title: You just got your weekly bonus for “Time on app” +{{.weekly_time_bonus}} LIT points
notifications.first_weekly_time_bonus_body: You are doing great! You can keep accumulating weekly bonus points and transfer them to your points wallet anytime.
notifications.first_guest_x_earned_points_title: You just earned your first {{.earned_points}} LIT points. Create your account to transfer them to your points wallet.
notifications.first_guest_x_earned_points_body: On Lit.it you earn rewards for watching & sharing videos or inviting people
notifications.first_weekly_followers_bonus_title: You just got your weekly bonus for “Followers gained” on lit.it +{{.weekly_followers_bonus}} LIT points
notifications.first_weekly_followers_bonus_body: You are doing great! You can keep accumulating weekly bonus points and transfer them to your points wallet anytime.
notifications.creator_status_rejected_body: Your Creator approval process has been rejected.
notifications.creator_status_approved_body: Your Creator status has been approved
notifications.first_daily_followers_bonus_title: You just got your daily bonus for “Followers gained” on lit.it +{{.daily_followers_bonus}} LIT points
notifications.first_daily_followers_bonus_body: If you do this daily bonus 7 days in a row you get a weekly super bonus of {{.weekly_followers_bonus}} LIT points.
notifications.first_referral_joined_title: Your first friend just joined Lit.it! You earned {{.referral_bonus}} LIT points.
notifications.first_referral_joined_body: You can share videos with your friends on Lit.it and earn {{.share_bonus}} LIT points for each share.
notifications.first_video_shared_title: You shared your first video on Lit.it. You earned {{.share_bonus}} LIT points.
notifications.first_video_shared_body: Did you know: if you share a video with a person that does not have Lit.it and he will join, you earn {{.referral_bonus}} LIT points for that join as well.
notifications.registration_verify_bonus_title: You earned your first {{.verify_reward_amount}} LIT points for joining Lit.it
notifications.registration_verify_bonus_body: You can invite friends and earn {{.referrer_verify_reward_amount}} LIT points for each friend who will join.
notifications.first_x_paid_views_as_content_owner_titl: Your videos just generated your first {{.views_content_owner_bonus_count}} views on Lit.it. You got {{.views_content_owner_bonus_total_earned}} LIT points.
notifications.first_x_paid_views_as_content_owner_body: You earn {{.views_content_owner_bonus}} LIT point for each view your videos generate. Keep posting amazing content and earn more LIT points from your video views.
notifications.first_x_paid_views_title: You earned your first {{.total_earned}} LIT points for watching video
notifications.first_x_paid_views_body: You earn {{.view_bonus}} LIT point for each video you watched for {{.watch_threshold}}% of the time or more
notifications.top_x_in_subcategory_title: You just got to the TOP {{.top_in_category_bonus_place}} creators in {{.category_name}} category on Lit.it. You got {{.top_in_category_bonus}} LIT points.
notifications.top_x_in_subcategory_body: You earn {{.top_in_category_bonus}} LIT points each time when you stay in the TOP {{.top_in_category_bonus_place}} of category for the whole day.
notifications.guest_max_earned_points_for_views_title: You just earned maximum allowed LIT points as unregistered user.
notifications.guest_max_earned_points_for_views_body: You can earn 100 LIT points for watching videos as unregistered user. Create your Lit.it account now to keep getting points for watching videos.
notifications.daily_max_amount_of_paid_views_reached_t: You just earned maximum daily LIT points for watching videos!
notifications.daily_max_amount_of_paid_views_reached_b: You can earn up to {{.pointsAmount}} LIT per day for watching videos

notifications.monthly_mega_bonus_progress_body: You are another day closer to your {{.monthly_bonus_amount}} LIT points Mega bonus. Keep watching to earn {{.daily_bonus_amount}} LIT points daily bonus.
notifications.monthly_mega_bonus_progress_almost_finis: You are another day closer to your {{.monthly_bonus_amount}} LIT points Mega bonus. Keep watching to earn {{.daily_bonus_amount}} LIT points daily bonus. You have only {{.days_left}} days left
